headline: Expand Energy (NasdaqGS:EXE) Added to Prestigious Indices
summary: Expand Energy (NasdaqGS:EXE) was recently added to several prestigious indices, including the S&P Global 1200, S&P 500 Equal Weighted, and FTSE All-World Index, reflecting its growing prominence. Despite the broader market experiencing notable declines, with key indexes dropping around 12% amid tariff-related volatility, Expand Energy's share price rose 4% over the past month. This performance might have been bolstered by its new index inclusions, potentially reinforcing investor confidence...

headline: Liberty Energy & Range Resources Team Up for Power Generation Facility
summary: LBRT, Range Resources and Imperial Land collaborate on a natural gas power plant project, providing energy for a state-of-the-art data center in Washington County.

headline: NextDecade Signs 20-Year LNG Supply Agreement With Aramco
summary: NEXT secures a 20-year LNG supply deal from Aramco, marking a major milestone for the Rio Grande LNG Train 4 project pending final investment approval.
